document.masterDocTitle: New taxa of terrestrial molluscs from Turkey (Gastropoda, Pristilomatidae, Enidae, Hygromiidae, Helicidae)

figureCitation.captionText: Figures 4 - 12. Enidae. 4 - 10 Meijeriella spp. 4 Meijeriella canaliculata, Vil. H. P. M. G. Menkhorst, H = 11.45 mm 8 Meijeriella frivaldskyi, NMBE 28357, Ruins of Truva, leg. B. A. Guemues, 10.06.2008, H = 10.6 mm. 9 - 11 Turanena spp. 9. Turanena demirsoyi sp. n., holotype NMBE 32704, Erzincan, Kemaliye, Dilli Deresi, 870 m alt., leg. B. A. Guemues, H = 12.15 mm 10 Turanenea cochlicopoides, Paratype SMF 309776, Vil. Gaziantep, along the road Gaziantep → Bahce, ca. 12 km NW Gaziantep, 1000 m alt., leg. Menkhorst, 15.07.1986, H = 5.6 mm 11 Turanena cochlicopoides; NMBE 32713, between Arslanoba and Dolunay villages (the rocks around the Cahit Bilgin Park), 39.249 ° N, 38.599 ° E, 1560 m alt., leg. B. A. Guemues, 07.09.2007 12 Buliminus alepensis alepensis NMBE 32709, Cit Koeyue, 39.1119 ° N, 38.6043 ° E, 976 m alt. 05.05.2007, leg. B. A. Guemues. - All figures scaled x 5.

subSubSection.paragraph: Turanena cochlicopoides E. Gittenberger & Menkhorst, 1993, Archiv fuer Molluskenkunde, 122 (Zilch Festschr.): 74, map 1, pl. 1 fig. 1 [Vilayet Gaziantep: leere Gehaeuse zwischen den Felsen der Strasse Gaziantep-Bahce entlang, 60 km oe . Bahce , in 1000 m Meereshoehe ; CB 31]

Vil. Erzincan, Kemaliye, between Arslanoba and Dolunay villages (the rocks around the Cahit Bilgin Park), 39.249°N , 38.599°E , 1560 m alt., 07.05.2007, leg. B. A. Guemues , NMBE 32712/2; ditto, 07.09.2007, NMBE 32713/2.

This is the second record for this species since its description. Interestingly, the new location is quite far away from the type locality (ca. 250 km in direct line), so it can be assumed that this species lives in a much larger area than expected before, but seems to be quite rare.
